question: My mother had an  catartt operation to her left eye, operated eye is fine but later after few weeks she had yellow vision problem, she always complains that she is seeing white things yellow and she thinks its not from the operated eye, but from other eye, can u please advise us whether its related to operation or due to diabetes as she has diabetes and she takes insulin injections at the same time  she too have a little high BP. Thank's
title: yellow vision
